channel.title: Testing out new codes
channel.description: How can i test out something on a different source and client while running my original for players to play on so they don't have to wait and be disconnected?

item.title: Testing out new codes
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“tank nation, post:3, topic:554442”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=673366.msg4502581#msg4502581 date=1453054826]
open a new server with a different port? lol
[/quote]

Yeah i know but what about the source you can’t load another one it will not load fully[/quote]

what do you mean it won’t load fully? just change the port that the server is binding to it will work, if you mean you’re having problems with two servers accessing the same resources, i meant to completely copy your files to another folder and then run it.

Read full topic

item.title: Testing out new codes
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

Soulxs:

Do you have a vps? Assuming you do, host your server on the vps. Use the same source and client on your home computer but set the ip to localhost.

No i don’t i just host from my pc for now, if i some how am able to run 2 sources at a time i can test alot of stuff… but also i always see other servers that have a developers world?

Read full topic
